extendedInfo.description: Math BINGO is a fun way for children to practice math facts on your phone/tablet. Choose from addition, subtraction, multiplication or division BINGO, then select a level of difficulty.

reviews.title: Timer
reviews.comment: Wish I could turn the timer off given that it keeps running while waiting for problem and even after u win or get a spot, it keeps going. Being that I\'m a lil competitive, it\'s annoying. I play it right now to pass time, but will pay for a better one w/o a faulty timer when my child is old enough to play.
reviews.author: Sandra Cross

reviews.title: Makes math a fun game
reviews.comment: Pros: Difficulty levels are ok. Cons: It\'s player versus clock.  No multi-player/multi-device ability. Timer runs on. It should only start when the problem is fully given (which slowly types out) and should stop when a square is chosen. Also runs on after getting a bingo, including adding time to play the winning bugle tune.  Speaking of tune,  the music is an infantile music box loop, and no option to kill it during game play. More about the time score, the only way to get an absolute best score is to be lucky to get 5 problems in a row for a quick bingo. Otherwise, the time is really a penalty for not being lucky. The time in no way measures the players ability to do math, where correct or incorrect answers should be factored in to a true score. Recommendation: It\'s a good game for free. Get it. Be sure to disable the music and pay no attention to the time as a score. The student will be excited enough just to hear the winning bugle sound, though will be quickly bored having no multi-player competition.
reviews.author: Jeff Carter

reviews.title: Awesome!

reviews.title: TIME
reviews.comment: From the moment you have a bingo the timer should stop ticking. When u have bingo it takes to long it 5 sec to recognize and another 10 seconds to play that stupid trumpet sound. A full 12-15 seconds this is unfair. Also it takes 5-7 seconds after u answer just for the next question. How you suppose to get record times like this. So for this reason i only rate a 3. Otherwise it\'s a good concept. I love bingo also i have very poor math skills. It is a perfect learning game for me . Just please fix the timing
reviews.author: A Google User
